original_text: So Ebed-melech took the men with him and went to the house of the king, to a wardrobe in the storehouse, and took from there old rags and worn-out clothes, which he let down to Jeremiah in the cistern by ropes.
korean_text: 에벳멜렉이 사람들을 데리고 왕궁 곳간 밑 방에 들어가서 거기에서 헝겊과 낡은 옷을 가져다가 그것을 구덩이에 있는 예레미야에게 밧줄로 내리며

sentences.original_text: So Ebed-melech took the men with him
and went to the house of the king
to a wardrobe in the storehouse
and took from there old rags and worn-out clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거기서 낡은 헝겊과 해진 옷을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: which he let down to Jeremiah
